resources.string: “It’s not only about ideas. It’s about making ideas happen.” Enactus believes in investing in students who take entrepreneurial action for others and create a more suitable world for us all. It is all about social work for underprivileged people and at the same time creating social entrepreneurship. It puts forth the leaders of tomorrow who with their altruistic values work towards making the world a better place both for the privileged as well as the underprivileged . We at Enactus Shivaji carry forward the same values and contribute our bit towards the society. This we have made possible through a host of different projects and initiatives. One such significant one is project SANA . We truly believe that the greatest good one can do for another is not just share your riches , but to reveal to him his own by imparting knowledge and skills that were once far fetched .
